speaker: stan
text: Dipper! Go hang these signs up in the forest. I'd do it but I don't want to.

speaker: dipper
text: What? Why can't mabel do it?

speaker: stan
text: She said something about a unicorn, and round two.

speaker: dipper
text: Great. Thanks Mabel... Fine give them to me.

speaker: stan
text: Do a good job and I will maybe, possibly, probably not give you $10
